We love to move away from things that cause us distress or that cause us immense amounts of stress. Some say that nicotine is more addictive than many hard narcotics like crack cocaine, so it's easy to see why quitting smoking is so hard to do. This doesn't even begin to take into account the many chemicals that are added to cigarettes to make them extremely addictive. But smokers have many products and techniques they can use to kick the habit for good. Stopping smoking is something we now know a lot about and that's why there are now tons of products and tips out there.

We have talked about quitting cold turkey in other places, so it is only fair to make mention of gradual quitting. If you want to do it gradually, you must set a date that you are going to stick to. That is critical to following through on your actions. There have been many people who have attempted to quit without setting a stop date, but that only leads to slowing the habit until it picks up in frequency again. So you need to be committed to stopping on a certain date. Then, give yourself plenty of time to have a complete strategy in place that includes all the products and support system you need. When you've had your last cigarette, throw out everything that reminds you of your old habit. It cannot be reiterated enough how important this step is. Anything that smells like smoke needs to be gotten rid of. Make sure you throw out ashtrays, lighters, cigarette packs, etc. Any clothing that may have been exposed to smoke needs to be washed thoroughly. After you have quit, you will most likely do that anyway because you probably will not be able to stand the smell.

If you think it's necessary, try using one of the many products that help you quit by giving you a little bit of nicotine. This is called nicotine replacement therapy, and these products give you a little bit of nicotine by way of gum, patches, gels and more. Many people have quit the habit without nicotine replacement, but they are preferred by some because they help with nicotine withdrawal. You should also search some ways to get rid of anxiety, stress and all the other things you're feeling during this time.
